trigger.title: Trigger: Ride Entity in Lava
trigger.description: Triggers when a player mounts an entity walking on lava and while the entity moves with them.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

start_position.title: Start Position
start_position.description: A location predicate for the last position before the player mounted the entity.

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: The distance between the start position and the player's position.
